definition: the act of moving smoothly along a surface while remaining in contact with it, to move effortlessly
details:
noun
- the act of moving smoothly along a surface while remaining in contact with it
= synonyms: glide
- the area within view
= example: the area within view
- a slope down which sleds may coast
= example: a slope down which sleds may coast
- the shore of a sea or ocean
= synonyms: seashore, seacoast, sea-coast
verb
- to move effortlessly
= example: to move effortlessly
